plugin.name: Loqui_Potion_Purchasing_Manager
plugin.author: Raaigar
plugin.description: *----------:::LoquI Potion Purchasing Manager:::--------------* | | | lpot help ---> Displays this help | | | | hp * ---> Sets health pot to * | | mn * ---> Sets mana pot to * | | mv * ---> Sets moves pot to * | | hpq * ---> Sets quantity of health pot to buy to * | | mnq * ---> Sets quantity of mana pot to buy to * | | mvq * ---> Sets quantity of moves pot to buy to * | | dhp ---> Displays health potion | | dmnp ---> Displays mana potion | | dmvp ---> Displays moves potion | | dpot ---> Displays all potions set | | dhpq ---> Displays health potion quantity | | dmnpq ---> Displays mana potion quantity | | dmvpq ---> Displays moves potion quantity | | dqty ---> Displays all quantities set | | hp ---> Buys qty of health pot | | mn ---> Buys qty of mana pot | | mv ---> Buys qty of moves pot | *-------------------------------------------------------------*

alias.send: SetVariable ("hp_qty", "%1") ColourNote ("red", "white", "Health Potion Quantity set to: %1")
SetVariable ("mn_qty", "%1") ColourNote ("red", "white", "Mana Potion Quantity set to: %1")
SetVariable ("mv_qty", "%1") ColourNote ("red", "white", "Moves Potion Quantity set to: %1")

ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Potions:") ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Health Potion: @health_pot") ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Mana Potion: @mana_pot") ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Moves Potion: @moves_pot")

ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Potion Quantities:") ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Health Potion Quantity: @hp_qty") ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Mana Potion Quantity: @mn_qty") ColourNote ("black", "yellow", "Moves Potion Quantity: @mv_qty")
